content: wind spinners look lovely in your garden balcony or terrace when you attach it right the wind spinner automatically twirls even in a slight wind this pattern has tapered ends the pattern also explains how to make the wind spinner in such a way that speeds up the work and saves yarn can be made in many different yarn weights which is why i haven t given a gauge or amount of yarn needed the technique is the same regardless of how long you want your wind spinner to be select a crochet hook that goes with your yarn written pattern and a step by step video tutorial
